title: HTML Iframes
gp1: An HTML iframe is used to display a web page within a web page.
gp2: The HTML <iframe> tag specifies an inline frame.
gp3: An inline frame is used to embed another document within the current HTML document.
gp4: Tip: It is a good practice to always include a title attribute for the <iframe>. This is used by screen readers to read out what the content of the iframe is.
